趁.definition: to avail oneself of; to take advantage of

趁亂逃脫.definition: to run away in the confusion; to take advantage of the confusion to escape

趁人之危.definition: to take advantage of sb's difficulties (idiom)

趁便.definition: to take the opportunity; in passing

趁勢.definition: to take advantage of a favorable situation; to seize an opportunity

趁心.definition: variant of 稱心|称心[chen4 xin1]

趁手.definition: conveniently; without extra trouble; convenient; handy

趁早.definition: as soon as possible; at the first opportunity; the sooner the better; before it's too late

趁早兒.definition: erhua variant of 趁早[chen4 zao3]

趁火打劫.definition: lit. to loot a burning house (idiom); fig. to take advantage of sb's misfortune

趁熱打鐵.definition: to strike while the iron is hot

趁錢.definition: variant of 稱錢|称钱[chen4 qian2]
